dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Usually solitary; are rock-dwellers and do not roam the wide open sandy bottoms.  Carnivorous, preys on fish (Ref. 6770, 54948).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Endemic to Lake Tanganyika where it is widely distributed throughout the lake.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription

dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; freshwater; pH range: 8.0 - 9.0; dH range: 12
